record.description: Happy Graduates at the 241st convocation of the University of Chicago on Friday include Charleston C. Bard of Rochester, New York, Robert D. Tschirgi of San Diego, California, and Jean Harper Overton, granddaughter of the late William Rainey Harper, the school's first president. Mrs. Overton, mother of a 6-year old boy and 2-year old twins, was granted a Ph.D. in zoology.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
